languages.text: "Да как можно, это ж сам арбитр, пусть и разжалованный. Просто...". {n}Респиратор тюремщика издает судорожный сип.{/n} "Он в труде своем так ревностен, что нам, простым людям, за ним не угнаться".

"Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."
languages.original_text: "Да как можно, это ж сам арбитр, пусть и разжалованный. Просто...". {n}Респиратор тюремщика издает судорожный сип.{/n} "Он в труде своем так ревностен, что нам, простым людям, за ним не угнаться".

traits.locale_text: "Most certainly not! He is an arbitrator through and through, albeit a demoted once. Except...". {n}The jailer's rebreather emits an agonising wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

"Most certainly not! He is an arbitrator through and through, albeit a demoted once. Except...". {n}The jailer's rebreather emits an agonising wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

"Most certainly not! He is an arbitrator through and through, albeit a demoted one. It's just...". {n}The jailer's rebreather emits an agonising wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

"Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

"Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

languages.text: 「とんでもございません！彼は間違いなくアービトレイターです。たとえ解任されたとはいえ。ですが…」{n}看守のガスマスクが震えるような喘ぎ音を発した。{/n}「彼は仕事に対して非常に勤勉で、私たち一般人はついていけません」
languages.original_text: "Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

traits.locale_text: 「とんでもございません！彼は間違いなくアービトレイターです。たとえ解任されたとはいえ。ですが…」{n}看守のガスマスクが震えるような喘ぎ音を発した。{/n}「彼は仕事に対して非常に勤勉で、私たち一般人はついていけません」

languages.text: "Überhaupt nicht! Er ist ein Arbitrator durch und durch, wenn auch ein entlassener. Es ist nur ..." {n}Aus dem Atemschutzgerät des Wärters erklingt ein zitterndes Keuchen.{/n} "Er ist in seiner Arbeit so gründlich, dass wir gewöhnlichen Leute nicht mithalten können."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

traits.locale_text: "Überhaupt nicht! Er ist ein Arbitrator durch und durch, wenn auch ein entlassener. Es ist nur ..." {n}Aus dem Atemschutzgerät des Wärters erklingt ein zitterndes Keuchen.{/n} "Er ist in seiner Arbeit so gründlich, dass wir gewöhnlichen Leute nicht mithalten können."

languages.text: « Non, pas le moins du monde ! C'est un véritable arbitrator, même s'il a été déclassé. C'est juste que... {n}Le respirateur du geôlier émet un sifflement.{/n} Il est si scrupuleux dans son travail que les gens ordinaires, dont je fais partie, ont des difficultés à suivre son rythme. »
languages.original_text: "Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

traits.locale_text: « Non, pas le moins du monde ! C'est un véritable arbitrator, même s'il a été déclassé. C'est juste que... {n}Le respirateur du geôlier émet un sifflement.{/n} Il est si scrupuleux dans son travail que les gens ordinaires, dont je fais partie, ont des difficultés à suivre son rythme. »

languages.text: «¡No, para nada! Es un Arbitrator de tomo y lomo, aunque ya no pertenezca al Arbites. Es solo que...». {n}El carcelero resuella a través de su respirador.{/n} «Es tan diligente en sus labores que los trabajadores corrientes somos incapaces de seguirle el ritmo».
languages.original_text: "Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

traits.locale_text: «¡No, para nada! Es un Arbitrator de tomo y lomo, aunque ya no pertenezca al Arbites. Es solo que...». {n}El carcelero resuella a través de su respirador.{/n} «Es tan diligente en sus labores que los trabajadores corrientes somos incapaces de seguirle el ritmo».

languages.text: “一点都没有！尽管他已经卸任了，但他依然是位不折不扣的法务官。只是……”{n}狱卒的呼吸器发出了颤抖的喘息。{/n}“他工作起来实在是太卖命了，我们普通人根本跟不上他的节奏。”
languages.original_text: "Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

traits.locale_text: “一点都没有！尽管他已经卸任了，但他依然是位不折不扣的法务官。只是……”{n}狱卒的呼吸器发出了颤抖的喘息。{/n}“他工作起来实在是太卖命了，我们普通人根本跟不上他的节奏。”

languages.text: "Olmaz öyle şey! Azledilmiş olsa da baştan aşağı bir Yargıcı'dır kendisi. Sadece..." {n}Zindancının solunum cihazından titrek bir hırıltı geliyor.{/n} "İşinde o kadar hamarat ki biz sıradan insanlar olarak ona yetişemiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly not! He is an Arbitrator through and through, albeit a discharged one. It's just..." {n}The jailer's rebreather emits a shuddering wheeze.{/n} "He is so diligent in his work that us common people cannot keep up."

traits.locale_text: "Olmaz öyle şey! Azledilmiş olsa da baştan aşağı bir Yargıcı'dır kendisi. Sadece..." {n}Zindancının solunum cihazından titrek bir hırıltı gelir.{/n} "İşinde o kadar hamarat ki biz sıradan halk olarak ona yetişemiyoruz."
